name: Cosmic Creatures
description:
What has started cannot be stopped. 

Or can it?

Cosmic Creatures is a sci-fi action game. You play as an officer investigating the sudden emergence of unknown creatures that attack a research station on a small red planet. While on your mission, you meet a mysterious stranger who is up to something sinister.

Use your trusty laser gun to shoot your way through the onslaught of hostile creatures. Dodge frenzied enemy bullet attacks.  Collect experience to level up and choose upgrades to improve your chances of survival.

---

This is a short game made for Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth game jam. It's a prototype made by one person in one month.
